'''Sands of Eon''', also known colloquially as "'''the clock'''," "'''the hourglass'''," "'''the timepiece'''," "'''the watch'''," or just "'''the sands'''," is an [[Artifact]] Piece in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. It increases a [[character]]'s attributes and has 5 possible main affixes: HP%, DEF%, ATK%, [[Elemental Mastery]], or [[Energy Recharge]]. Artifact Pieces can appear in all qualities (1–5 stars).
